content: in this legal case two parties referred to as gg and lg have reached a compromise agreement regarding the division of their joint property an apartment lg will become the sole owner of the property and has paid gg a compensation amount of 10500 euros both parties have agreed to register this compromise in the land register the court has confirmed the compromise and revoked the previous court order the court has also ordered the parties to share the costs of the proceedings and for one party to be reimbursed for half of their fees the court has instructed the payment of certain amounts to the parties and the ministry of finance the case is now closed but the parties have the option to appeal the courts order the court has clarified the procedure for filing a complaint and the time limits involved the court order confirming the compromise terminated the civil case the court examined the compromise agreement and found it to be wellfounded the court cited specific articles of the legal code to support its decisions the ministry of finance received a payment of 10500 euros the court explained the consequences of the compromise including the option for either party to file a new lawsuit or apply for enforcement if the other party fails to fulfill their obligations the court also shortened the time limit for appeal to three days the parties agreed to bear the costs of the proceedings and the state fee paid will be refunded the court granted the claimants application for reimbursement of half of the fees paid amounting to 210 euros
